'''Dani Delgado''' is the mother of [[Zaza Delgado]].

==History==
Dani was waiting outside while firefighters attempted to put out her neighbors' house. She told Maya she thought there were at least six people living in the house, a large family that had chosen to quarantine together. Later, Dani searched the area for her son, Zaza, whom she said loved fire trucks. She believed he was hanging around somewhere as she hadn't found him in his bed. Maya promised they'd keep an eye out for him. They eventually learned that Zaza was inside the Garcia house as he had helped their Abuelita get back to bed.

Soon after, they found Zaza in a closet with burns over 30% of his body and brought him outside. With an aid car eight minutes away, Dani said she would transport him in her own car, but was told it wasn't safe as he needed treatment along the way. Maya then went against [[Fire Chief McCallister|Fire Chief McCallister's]] direct order to wait for the aid car and decided to transport Zaza in the fire engine.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She has a nine year old son, Zaza, and is expecting another child.
